description:
The City of Baltimore is constantly seeking innovative and creative ways to alleviate traffic congestion and green house gases in our great city. A new fleet of eco-friendly buses will provide everyone with a faster, more convenient, greener way to move about Baltimore's busy downtown neighborhoods. 
A headway is the amount of time that passes between two buses.  The goal for the Charm City Circulator headways is a bus every ten minutes. Morning and evening peak times for each route are(7 am – 9 am and 4 pm – 6 pm.

name: Charm City Circulator Headways
